                       int maxChips)
        this method processes a a players turn by taking his/her choice and updating score and pile size
        Parameters:
        playerName - the name of the player whose turn it is
        maxChips - the maximum number of chips that the current player can choose

      • play

        public void play()
        this method checks which players turn it is and allow that player to take his/hers turn and also if the game is over checks who is the winer and prints the winner

      • replayOrExit

        public static boolean replayOrExit()
        check if the user wants to replay or exit
        Returns:
